nodes.text: Deadly Reunion is a comic strip written by Archie Goodwin and illustrated by Al Williamson, originally published in 1981 by the Los Angeles Times Syndicate. It was later reprinted in Amazing Heroes magazine #17–20.

It was later republished by Dark Horse Comics, beginning on page 7 of Classic Star Wars 6 and ending on page 14 of Classic Star Wars 7. It was republished again on StarWars.com's webstrips section of Hyperspace.
